title: Robert Burns and Mrs. Dunlop;
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: They are like game-cocks ; they sight with more than natural weapons, and strike their antagonist through the heart. Nor can any letter of mine protect it, as yours did mine in the piece I send you called " Lennoxlove : inscribed to a Friend." Pray tell me what you think of it.

title: Robert Burns and Mrs. Dunlop;
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: (i) Lennoxlove — the name of the seat of the Stuarts of Blantyre, near Morham Mains.
